GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics with each topic having a slug and description key

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up a single specified article object

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array of comments from the specified article (by article_id).

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Validates a users comment, then inserts to the table of comments, and finally responds with the posted comment.

comment.body: The sixth sick sheik's sixth sheep's sick
comment.author: rogersop

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the votes for specified article by a value 'newVote'. Responds with the article object with updated vote number.

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the specified comment and responds with no content
DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.exampleResponse: No response - only 204 status code on completion
